effect.effectiveweapons.fire_guard.descr: Reduces all fire damage taken by 40% and cuts burning time in half
effect.effectiveweapons.elevated.descrip: Increases the user's movement speed by 65% and the user's damage dealt by 50%, reduces user's damage taken by 20%, but user takes 10% of their health as recoil damage after each attack
death.attack.pact_axe_recoil_damage: %1$s paid the price of the pact
death.attack.double_bow_recoil_damage: %1$s suffered the recoil of pulling a bow too much
tooltip.spiraling_sword_cont: a certain amount of damage is dealt
tooltip.spiraling_sword_cont_death: a certain amount of mobs are killed
tooltip.spiraling_sword_charge: Charge: increases every time damage is dealt, max: 200
tooltip.spiraling_sword_charge_cont: Increase: damage dealt before target's damage reduction
tooltip.spiraling_sword_charge_death: Charge: increases every time a mob is killed, max: 100
tooltip.blessed_lance_cont: and deals §e+4§r extra damage to §eundead§r mobs
tooltip.dekaja_tome_cont: all positive status effects active on
tooltip.dekaja_tome_cont_part_two: all entities present in a certain area
tooltip.pact_axe_summary: Deals triple damage, but can backfire
tooltip.pact_axe: Each attack can inflict §edouble§r the user's
tooltip.pact_axe_cont: attack as extra damage, but there is a chance
tooltip.pact_axe_cont_part_two: the bonus damage may §ebe inflicted on its§r
tooltip.pact_axe_cont_part_three: §eown user§r or §eremove one of their active effects§r
tooltip.pact_axe_cont_part_four: Awards the user with extra experience points
tooltip.double_bow_summary: Shoots fixed damage arrows 2 times as far as a regular bow
tooltip.double_bow: Takes longer to shoot, but shoots fixed damage
tooltip.double_bow_cont: arrows twice as far as a regular bow. Charging
tooltip.double_bow_cont_part_two: for 2 seconds guarantees a powerful critical shot,
tooltip.double_bow_cont_part_three: but removes strength or 25% of HP from its user
tooltip.double_bow_damage: Arrow damage = 3 + user's generic damage + strength * 2
tooltip.light_shield_summary: Has no speed penalty, but can
tooltip.light_shield: Has no speed penalty when used and takes
tooltip.light_shield_cont: no durability damage, but can only block
tooltip.sneak_meter: Use while §esneaking§r to activate its meter ability
tooltip.sneak_air_meter: §eSneak§r in the §eair§r to activate its meter ability
tooltip.entity_meter: Use on §eanother§r entity to activate its meter ability
tooltip.attuned_customization_enabled: Can be customized using an §2Attuning Table§r
tooltip.passive_featherweight_explanatio: Increases user's safe fall height by 3 blocks
tooltip.passive_stride_explanation: Increases user's step height to 1 block
tooltip.passive_sweep_explanation: Increases user's sweep attack damage to 80% of their attack damage
tooltip.passive_sturdy_explanation: Increases user's armor by 3 when held
tooltip.passive_firm_explanation: Increases user's knockback resistance by 3 when held
tooltip.passive_buffer_explanation: Increases user's maximum health by 4 (2 hearts) while held. Does not include healing.
tooltip.passive_death_charge_explanation: Increases meter charge by 50% of any killed entity's HP, but meter is not charged when just dealing damage
tooltip.meter_fire_guard_explanation: Grants a status effect that reduces fire damage by 40% and cuts burning time in half
tooltip.meter_lunge_explanation: Launches user to the direction they are looking at
tooltip.meter_stagger_explanation: When meter is full, inflicts weakness and mining fatigue on next attacker for 20 seconds
tooltip.meter_spiral_explanation: If any of the user's status effect has a duration lower than 5 minutes, extends it by 50% for a maximum of 5 minutes and a minimum of 1 minute
tooltip.meter_allied_spiral_explanation: Extends another entity's status effects by 50% for a maximum of 5 minutes and a minimum of 1 minute
tooltip.meter_chaotic_spiral_explanation: If any of the user's status effect has a duration lower than 5 minutes, extends it by a random amount between 20% and 80% for a maximum of 5 minutes and a minimum of 1 minute
tooltip.meter_elevated_explanation: Grants, for 30 seconds, a status effect that multiplies damage dealt by 1.5, reduces damage received by 20% and increases movement speed by 65%, but deals 10% of user's max health as recoil damage each attack. Charges with each successful full hit
tooltip.meter_refresh_explanation: Heals the user by 3 to 5 health and removes a random negative status effect on user, if any present. Charges with each successful full hit
tooltip.meter_grave_keeper_explanation: Automatically charges. Gives user a back dash by sneaking in the air
message.attuning_error: Could not apply modifier: item does not support attuning
